explanation: [0-0] In a room with gray wooden floors and white walls, a boy and a girl stand side by side, facing the camera. The boy is wearing a black short-sleeved T-shirt and black shorts, barefoot. The girl has long brown hair and is wearing a black hoodie and black leggings with white socks. The girl has a smile on her face, with the white caption "I love you" displayed above her head. The boy stands expressionless. Above the picture is the white caption "Nonchalant boy & Overthinker girl".
[0-4] The girl is dancing, and the white caption "IIy too" appears above the boy's head. Then the girl looks at the boy, and the boy imitates the girl's movements.
